function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of wearable devices and self-reported symptoms for COVID-19 detection","Impact":"Incomplete or inaccurate detection of COVID-19 cases","Mitigation":"Validation and cross-referencing with clinical testing, continuous improvement of algorithms","Technologies":"AI algorithms, data validation techniques","People":"Individuals providing data, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, technology companies"},{"Description":"Accelerated deployment of IoT technologies in healthcare","Impact":"Potential privacy and data security risks, suboptimal regulatory compliance","Mitigation":"Robust data security measures, compliance with privacy regulations, regular auditing of IoT systems","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure data storage, privacy-enhancing technologies","People":"Individuals sharing sensor data, healthcare organizations","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Use of handheld and portable ultrasound solutions for COVID-19 patients","Impact":"Potential misuse or misinterpretation of ultrasound data, inadequate disinfection leading to spread of infections","Mitigation":"Training for healthcare professionals, strict disinfection protocols, regular maintenance and checks","Technologies":"Training programs, disinfection protocols, maintenance guidelines","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients","Owner":"Healthcare institutions"}]}
